title: Black Cherry Blues
description: Winner of the Edgar award for best novel Evil crept into Dave Robicheaux's bayou world one night and destroyed the woman he loved. Now it's threatening the life of his innocent child. Framed for murder, the Cajun ex-cop is traveling far from his Louisiana home to clear his name, to help a friend, to save what remains of his familyâ€”seeking justice and revenge in the Big Sky Country of Montana.
author: James Lee Burke
